entry.title: Ali-Mardini/react-shade-loader: A lightweight and customizable skeleton loader for React applications. This package allows developers to easily display loading placeholders (skeletons) for various UI components while data is being fetched or processed.

entry.title: kenjiakira/Vue-Tiktok: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.
entry.content: TikTok Downloader with Vue.js A lightweight and responsive TikTok video downloader built with Vue.js. Paste the video link to download TikTok videos with or without a watermark. Features fast performance, clean UI, and easy integration.

entry.title: sbu-musida/digital-clock: A simple, live updating digital clock built with Vue.js. It displays the current time in HH:MM:SS format, updating every second using setInterval(). The app is lightweight, responsive, and powered by Vue's reactivity for seamless real-time performance.
entry.content: A simple, live updating digital clock built with Vue.js. It displays the current time in HH:MM:SS format, updating every second using setInterval(). The app is lightweight, responsive, and powered by Vue's reactivity for seamless real-time performance.
